Advertisement for the more easie and speedy collecting of debts Murray, Robert, 1635-1725?
1 sheet ([2] p.).
Printed for T. Langley, and are to be sold by Thomas Lambert ..., London : [1681?]
Attributed to Robert Murray by Wing (2nd ed.). Place and date of publication suggested by Wing (2nd ed.) Reproduction of original in the Bodleian Library.
